name: Aventurine

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A high-ranking executive of the IPC's Strategic Investment Department.A risk-taker, his constant smile makes it difficult for people to discern his true feelings.

skills.name: Straight Bet
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Cornerstone Deluxe
skills.description: Provides a shield with stackable Fortified Wager Shield effect to all allies.

skills.name: Roulette Shark
skills.description: Gains a random number of points in Blind Bet and inflicts Unnerved on a single enemy, dealing a large amount of Imaginary DMG. When an ally attacks an Unnerved enemy, increases the CRIT DMG dealt.

skills.name: Shot Loaded Right
skills.description: Effect RES increases on an ally with Fortified Wager. When an ally with Fortified Wager is attacked, Aventurine accumulates Blind Bet. When Aventurine has Fortified Wager, he can resist Crowd Control debuffs. Upon reaching 7 points of Blind Bet, Aventurine consumes the 7 points to launch a follow-up attack that deals minor Imaginary DMG to a random enemy, bouncing 7 times.

skills.name: The Red or the Black
skills.description: Using the Technique will grant 1 of 3 types of DEF Boost effects randomly. After entering the next battle, all allies' DEF increases by the corresponding amount.

eidolons.name: Prisoner's Dilemma
eidolons.description: Increases the CRIT DMG of allies with Fortified Wager by 20%. Provide a Fortified Wager Shield to the entire team. The Shield effect equals to 100% as that provided by the Skill, lasting for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Bounded Rationality
eidolons.description: When using Basic ATK, reduce the target's All-Type RES by 12% for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Droprate Maxing
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Unexpected Hanging Paradox
eidolons.description: When triggering his Talent's follow-up attacks, Aventurine's DEF first increases by 40% for 2 turn(s). The follow-up attack's Hits Per Action triggered by his Talent additionally increases by 3.

eidolons.name: Ambiguity Aversion
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Stag Hunt Game
eidolons.description: For each ally with Shield, the DMG dealt by Aventurine increases by 50%, up to a maximum increase of 150%.
